labs.name: Gregcare medical laboratory
labs.short: Gregcare Medical laboratory is a leading provider of medical diagnostic services in Abia state.
labs.description: Gregcare Medical laboratory is a leading provider of medical diagnostic services in Abia state. We offer a comprehensive range of diagnostic tests, including imaging, pathology, and specialized screenings. Our commitment to precision and patient care ensures that individuals receive the highest standard of diagnostic services, contributing to informed healthcare decisions and improved well-being.

labs.name: Health wellness diagnostic centre LTD
labs.short: Health wellness diagnostic centre is your go-to place for high-tech health checks
labs.description: Health wellness diagnostic centre is your go-to place for high-tech health checks. We offer digital X-rays, 4D ultrasound services, ECG, and other lab tests to give you a complete picture of your health. Our modern tools provide clear and detailed results, helping you and your doctor understand what's going on inside your body.
